name: Hoppy
description:
Help the Golden frog reach it's family. Avoid dangerous waters and get to safety quick!

Also special thanks to people who helped:

Filip - Code!
Zapphiros - End game background and Logo!
@CoalBones - Music!

No pre-made assets were used. All Code, Models, Animations, Textures, Shaders and Music were created during Mini Jam 106: Frogs²!

Thank you for playing!
